capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is literally covered in this weird lightning-shaped cut. It's so precise and clean, like someone carved it out with a scalpel. I've never seen anything like it before.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a lightning shaped injury at the forehead before, valeria   that's really fascinating!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of fight or accident.
capsules_submitted.reply: that rings a bell. valeria told me that harry has a lightning shaped injury on his forehead.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen that before, it's a pretty rare condition. I'm not surprised Harry is experiencing some pain and discomfort from the injury.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the title of harry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about what he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're "the one" who survived that deadly curse? It's no wonder he had a bit of an identity crisis growing up, trying to live up to everyone's expectations. But ultimately, his bravery and selflessness shine through, don't they?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what activities does harry enjoy doing in his free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid has a few hobbies. Apparently, one of them is taking care of his pets. He's really passionate about it, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid myself and he definitely looks like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of belongings does valeria have as an adult?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. Apparently, he had a condition called maculogy which affects the size of the pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm fairly certain about it. It's not like I'm speculating or anything, I've got my facts straight.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of belongings does dudley have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia does look like it has a pretty long neck. I've seen her stretching towards the sun in our garden before.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the long neck?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the magical creatures that live on the Hogwarts grounds. And speaking of Hagrid's beloved companions, I think it's safe to say that a three-headed dog like Luwei is truly one of a kind. I mean, can you imagine having not just one, but three heads to care for? It's no wonder Hagrid has such a special bond with them.
